scripts.lint: npm run lint --prefix client && npm run lint --prefix server
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint --fix --prefix client && npm run lint --fix --prefix server
scripts.install: npm run install:client && npm run install:server
scripts.dev:server: cd server && npm run dev && cd ..
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && cd client && rm -rf node_modules && cd .. && cd server && rm -rf node_modules && cd ..
scripts.format: cd client && npm run format && cd .. && cd server && npm run format && cd ..
scripts.e2e: concurrently -k -n SERVER,CYPRESS -c green,blue "cross-env NODE_ENV=test npm run dev" "wait-on http://localhost:3001/api/users && cross-env NODE_ENV=test npm run cypress:run"
